articles.title: Greetings to Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian President
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sunday sent a message of greetings to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, President of Algeria, on the occasion of his 72nd birthday.
					 Kim in the message wished him good health and happiness and greater successes in his important work for the steady progress and prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Libyan Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Libyan Leader
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sunday sent a message of greetings to Moammer el Gaddafi, Leader of the revolution of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, on the occasion of the 32nd anniversary of the proclamation of its Jamahiriya.
					 Kim in the message wished him good health and happiness and greater successes in his noble work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Meeting Commemorates 90th Anniversary of March First Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Meeting Commemorates 90th Anniversary of March First Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Pyongyang City was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday to commemorate the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 Present there were Vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, Chairwoman of the C.C., the Chondoist Chongu Party Ryu Mi Yong, Presidium Member of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea Kang Ryon Hak, Director of the Secretariat of the C.C., the DFRK Kim Wan Su, Director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea An Kyong Ho, leading officials of social organizations and working people from all walks of life in Pyongyang.
					
					 A report was delivered by Yang Hyong Sop.
					
					 The reporter said that the March First Popular Uprising fiercely staged shaking the whole land of Korea 90 years ago was a nationwide anti-Japanese patriotic resistance to regain the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists and establish the national sovereignty.
					
					 He recalled that the flames of anti-Japanese struggle kindled in Pyongyang swept the 13 provinces of the country in an instant and developed into a nationwide resistance as it spread even to overseas Koreans in Manchuria, Shanghai, Maritime Province of Russia, Hawaii and other places. More than 2 million people from all walks of life participated in the resistance for three months since its start and at least 3,200 demonstrations and riots took place by the end of that year, he added.
					
					 The Koreans' ardent desire for the national sovereignty and independence could be achieved as President Kim Il Sung led the struggle for national liberation to victory, he said, adding that the great revolutionary exploits of the President who established the most advantageous Korean-style socialist system centering on the popular masses and illuminated the road of national reunification will be immortal in the history of the country.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the President's revolutionary idea as the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche in his early days and declared the modeling of the whole society on the Juche idea as the greatest programme of our party and has wisely led the revolution and construction for a long period in keeping with the idea and intention of the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has trained the People's Army into invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and turned the DPRK into invincible power through his seasoned and experienced Songun leadership and thus ushered in a new era of prosperity of Songun Korea.
					
					 Thanks to his noble intention and will, the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by the President were formulated as the three charters for national reunification. And the five-point policy of the great unity of the nation, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and other landmarks of reunification common to the nation were provided and all Koreans could dynamically advance along the road of independent reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 We are facing weighty and urgent tasks to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation of Juche and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, as soon as possible under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, said the reporter, elaborating:
					
					 South Koreans and all other Koreans from all walks of life at home and abroad should wage dynamic struggle to reject dependence on foreign forces and defend sovereignty of the nation and thus mete out stern punishment to the group of traitors keen on serving outsiders.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never tolerate the treachery of the south Korean conservative authorities hell-bent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders in utter disregard of the destiny of the country and the nation but mercilessly punish the group.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop anachronistic anti-DPRK racket and reckless moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK, stop hindering peace and reunification of Korea and withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea at once taking with them war means.
					
					 If the U.S. warlike forces opt for reckless military confrontation and provocation of a war of aggression against the DPRK, defying the repeated warnings issued by it and its principled stand, the latter will mercilessly stamp out aggressors with powerful Songun arms which know neither mercy nor forgiveness and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Should the Japanese reactionaries persistently maintain hostile policy toward the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and the moves to stage a comeback to Korea, quite contrary to the just requirements of the Korean nation and the times, the army and people of the DPRK will give vent to their pent-up hatred and wrath and certainly force Japan to pay a high price.
					
					The reporter called upon all the people to more strenuously struggle for the prosperity of the socialist country, the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, rallied close around the headquarters of the revolution headed by
						Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Dynamic Advance of Cause of National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Dynamic Advance of Cause of National Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an editorial dedicated to the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising (March 1, 1919) calls for smashing the blatant challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad by dint of united efforts of the nation and dynamically accelerating the advance of the cause of national independence.
					 The uprising was the eruption of the pent-up resentment and grudge of the Korean nation who suffered bitter humiliation and mistreatment under the brutal "military rule" of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The participants in the uprising who fell down shedding blood called for national sovereignty. A grave obstacle, however, is now lying in the way of struggle for realizing it, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 As the U.S. imperialists, who occupied south Korea in place of the Japanese imperialists, have pursued the strategy for dominating Korea, the reunification of the country has not yet been realized even in the 21st century and there persists tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Japan which brought immeasurable misfortune and disaster to the Korean people in the past is whetting sword for reinvasion while distorting its history of aggression and becoming undisguised in its wild ambition to grab Tok Islet, far from making an honest apology and reparation for its heinous crimes indelible down through generations.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group which grabbed power last year is getting frantic with the moves for the north-south confrontation, turning its back on the nation and totally negating the June 15 joint declaration, great programme for independent reunification, and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The reality requires the Korean nation to stage a strenuous struggle against the moves for confrontation and war of the separatists at home and abroad.
					
					 It is necessary to raise higher the flame of struggle for independence against foreign forces.
					
					 The Korean nation should resolutely reject the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, dynamically stage the nationwide struggle to drive out the U.S. aggressor forces from south Korea, check and frustrate the moves of the U.S., Japan and south Korea for organizing the "triangular military alliance" and the reckless racket of warmongers at home and abroad for a war of aggression against the north and turn out as one in the struggle for peace against war to defend peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is also necessary to raise higher everywhere the Koreans live the flame of anti-Japanese struggle for disclosing and condemning the Japanese reactionaries' criminal attempt to distort the history of aggression and grab Tok Islet and foiling their hostile moves towards the DPRK.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should never pardon the Lee Myung Bak regime bringing misfortune and disaster to the nation while going against the trend of the times in collusion with foreign forces and wage more unflinching struggle to eliminate the group of traitors.
					
					 There are grave manifold difficulties and trials in the way of the Koreans struggling for the national sovereignty but nothing can block the advance of the times.

articles.title: Koreans to Certainly Force Japan to Pay Price for Its Crimes
articles.content:
Koreans to Certainly Force Japan to Pay Price for Its Crimes
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will certainly give vent to their grudge and resentment pent-up through centuries and settle accounts with Japan, their sworn enemy, for the crimes committed by it through history to force it to pay thousand-fold for the blood shed by Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun in a signed article.
					 It cites facts to disclose the motive of the March First Popular Uprising in 1919 and how it progressed and the Japanese imperialists' brutal suppression and killing of the participants in the uprising, adding that the Japanese imperialists' barbarous suppression of the participants in the uprising was an unpardonable crime against humanity as they ruthlessly violated the elementary political freedom and rights of the Korean people and their right to existence. This, therefore, was the brutal atrocities in gross violation of international law. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Nearly a century has passed since the uprising and more than six decades since the Japanese imperialists suffered a defeat. But the aggressive nature and ambition of the Japanese reactionaries remain unchanged and their moves for reinvasion have become evermore undisguised. 
					
					 Japan is the unpardonable sworn enemy who has done only harm to the Korean people through history. 
					
					 From the outset of the past century up to today, Japan has committed immeasurable crimes against the Korean people. The Korean people are keeping all of them in stock.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to the crimes against humanity.
					
					 The soul of those who shouted hoarse "Long live independence of Korea!" even shedding blood and falling down at the bayonets of the Japanese imperialists during the uprising still calls for revenge.
					
					 The Korean people's bitterness toward Japan is rising sky-high today. The Koreans will certainly force Japan to pay a dear price for its crimes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Crimes in First Year of His Office Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Crimes in First Year of His Office Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and other civic and public organizations of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 24 at which they denounced the crimes committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak in the first year of his office.
					 At the press conference speakers informed the participants of the "Lee Myung Bak non-confidence referendum" held across south Korea for more than 40 days from Jan. 8.
					
					 They noted that many voters from all walks of life bitterly denounced Lee for his crimes such as economic bankruptcy, deterioration of people's livelihood, violation of democracy, restoration of dictatorship, destruction of inter-Korean relations, etc.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime has run headlong into dictatorship, ignoring the demand of the people in all fabrics of society including politics, economy and education in the last one year, they said, terming the results of the vote a cold estimation and stern judgment by the people.
					
					 The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in a statement on Feb. 25 denounced the one year of Lee's office as one characterized by high-handedness, dictatorship and shift of responsibility onto others.
					
					 The statement stressed: Lee Myung Bak, step down at once. This is the unanimous demand of the people.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on the same day denounced puppet traitor Lee for his crimes committed in the first year of his office. The present "government" is making desperate efforts to blindfold people, stop their ears and bind their hands and feet but it cannot block the people's struggle, the statement added.

articles.title: Reception Given to Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Reception Given to Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Tarek Ahmed Mahpouz, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Egyptian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Feb. 28 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Hussein Haridy, assistant minister of Foreign Affairs of Egypt, on a visit to the DPRK and an official of Egyptian embassy were on hand there. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Moves to Ignite War against DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Moves to Ignite War against DPRK Flayed
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the warmongers of puppet military of south Korea announced that it would round off a new joint operation plan against the north to replace the "OPLAN-5027" by July with the United States and apply the said plan to Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to be staged in August. Meanwhile, they cried out that they would set up "ballistic guided missile operation control center" by 2012 under the pretext of "coping with the missile threat."
					 This is nothing but reckless provocative acts of pushing the tense situation on the Korean Peninsula closer to the outbreak of a nuclear war, says Rodong Sinmun today in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Under the prevailing situation in which the north and the south stand in acute military confrontation, the reckless provocative acts perpetuated by the Lee Myung Bak group may lead to an all-out war any moment. 
					
					 Traitor Lee should never be oblivious of the fact that the DPRK is closely following its military provocation with high vigilance.
					
					 It is the revolutionary spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to return fire for fire and mete out merciless punishment to the provocateurs.  
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces already expressed their principled stand to thoroughly foil the reckless war moves of the Lee group with merciless strike power and resolute action that can not be estimated with any ultra modern means.
					
					 If the puppet warmongers ignite a war at last in collusion with foreign forces, misjudging the self-restraint of our revolutionary armed forces that value the peace, the group of traitors can not escape from the final destruction.
					
					 The puppet warmongers would be well advised to behave themselves, mindful of what a high price they will have to pay in the end for their collusion with foreign forces to ignite a war against the north.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Urged to Step Down in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Urged to Step Down in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Association of Buddhist Priests for Realizing Buddhism held a press conference in Kyonggi Province on Feb. 24 to call for the resignation of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 Referring to the fact that the crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak "government" during the first year of its office surpasses by far those committed in the period of the military fascist dictatorship in the past, the organization asserted that they can no longer tolerate the traitor who savagely violates the democratic rights of the people. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak should be forced to step down in order to put an end to the biased policy of the present regime as it serves the interests of big businesses only while reducing the people's livelihood and economy to bankruptcy, the organization stated.
					
					 It noted that the struggle for probe into the truth about the tragic incident in Ryongsan is the way for giving vent to the people's resentment, calling on south Koreans of all social strata to turn out in the active struggle to punish those related to the killings and have the detained evacuees released.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Moves for Arms Buildup Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Moves for Arms Buildup Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations and inhabitants in the Suwon area, Kyonggi Province, called a press conference outside the U.S. air force base in Suwon on Feb. 26 and denounced the U.S. forces' moves for arms buildup, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 Recalling that the U.S. forces unilaterally announced on Feb. 19 the plan to deploy one squadron of F-16s of the U.S. air force and at least 400 personnel of the U.S. forces to operate them in the said base, they condemned it as a criminal act of aggravating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They said that the residents in the area around the U.S. air force base are suffering a lot of troubles in their living due to the damage done by noise of airplanes and high-performance bombs and depleted uranium shells, etc. scattered here and there.
					
					 They strongly demanded the U.S. forces repeal the said plan at once.

articles.title: GNP's Moves to Railroad Evil Bills Rebuffed
articles.content:
GNP's Moves to Railroad Evil Bills Rebuffed
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Media Action, the Solidarity for Progress, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference in front of the building of the puppet National Assembly on Feb. 26 at which they denounced the "Grand National Party" for its moves to railroad Lee Myung Bak's evil bills.
					 At the press conference the speakers recalled that the GNP which is playing the role of a voting machine of the Lee Myung Bak regime on Feb. 25 brought the "bill on media" up for discussion at the Committee of Culture, Sports, Tourism, Broadcasting and Communications of the "National Assembly".
					
					 Declaring the bill totally null and void, they said that they would escalate the struggle to judge the present regime in case the Lee "government" and the GNP railroad the undemocratic Lee's evil bills bringing the people's livelihood to destitution at any cost.
					
					 The Citizens Federation for Democratic Press made public a statement titled "Will the GNP opt for catastrophic situation in the end" on the same day.
					
					 The statement accused the GNP of dealing a blow to the people once again on Feb. 25, one year since Lee took office.
					
					 It stressed that they would join the Press Trade Union in its general strike to have the NA discussion of the "bill on media" cancelled.

articles.title: Resignation of Puppet Minister of National Defense Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Puppet Minister of National Defense Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down of south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 26 demanding the resignation of the puppet minister of National Defense, a war maniac inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 The statement said: Amid the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula he let loose a spate of extremely bellicose remarks that "more powerful armed forces would be deployed in the area along the northern limit line" and "the south would directly counter the north with warning shots without warning signal." 
					
					 He went the lengths of blaring out that the recent official announcement of the DPRK that it is making preparations for the launch of a satellite to use the space for peaceful purpose is "a threat to the south side."
					
					 A guy with the nature of a war maniac is bound to make everything an excuse for a war, the statement said, noting that the Lee Myung Bak murderous dictatorial regime, a war regime is wholly to blame for the crisis of a war mounting on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The way of preventing a war which may bring disaster to the nation and achieving its peace and prosperity is for all the Koreans to pool their efforts and force the Lee regime to step down, the statement noted.
					
					 It urged Ri Sang Hui, a henchman of the Lee regime, to resign his post as minister of "National Defense" at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Studied and Disseminated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Studied and Disseminated
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses on Socialism Are Intolerable" was widely studied and disseminated in various countries.
					 More than 250 media of over 80 countries carried and published the work for the last 16 years since its publication. The broad dissemination of the work was conducted in various forms and methods to deeply grasp Kim Jong Il's ideology and theory.
					
					 The Prensa Latina, the Lao newspaper Pasason, the Nepalese newspaper Majodur, the Tokyo Shimbun, the Romania Muncitoare and the Peruvian Santa Rosa and other media carried the full text or gist of the work.
					
					 The work was brought out in booklet by many publishing houses of different countries such as the Dar Al-Shaab Publishing House of Egypt, the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela, the Rote Fahne of Germany, the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan and the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House in Vienna of Austria.
					
					 The study and dissemination of the work were conducted in Russia, Austria, India, Nepal, Uganda, Namibia, Tanzania, Britain, Sweden, Spain, Norway and other countries in diverse forms and methods such as seminar, briefing, reading session and lecture and progressive political parties and organizations and figures of different countries issued statements.
					
					 The session of the Political Bureau of the New Communist Party of Britain decided to distribute booklets of the work to the members of the Central Committee of the party as a must book and the Italian Committee for the Reunification and Peace of Korea held an extraordinary enlarged meeting for reading out the work.

articles.title: February 16 Celebrated
articles.content:
February 16 Celebrated
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Meeting, book and photo exhibition, film show and Taekwon-Do demonstration were held in Cuba, Kyrgyzstan, Mexico and India between Feb. 1 and 9 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the functions were famous works of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there.  
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said that the Korean people are struggling for the building of a thriving nation under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il and its prospect is bright, expressing full support of the Cuban people to the Korean people in their struggle for the country's reunification and evincing his will to make all possible efforts for it.
					
					 The chairman and the vice-chairman of the Central Council of the Kyrgyz L People's Unity Party recalled that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into the bulwark of the cause of global independence by defending socialism with the Songun politics.
					
					 The speaker of the assembly of Oaxaca State of Mexico said that Kim Jong Il struck all people with admiration by turning the DPRK into an independent and dignified country by wisely leading the Korean people.
					
					 A message of greetings and a letter to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meeting held in Mexico.
					
					  DPRK film shows were held in Russia, Laos, Thailand, Singapore, Myanmar and the Czech Republic between Feb. 2 and 14 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Tunisian Figure Praises WPK's Just Cause
articles.content:
Tunisian Figure Praises WPK's Just Cause
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Mouhammad Bouchiha, secretary general of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia, issued a statement on Feb. 23 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, supporting the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea standing against imperialism.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il smashes all moves of hostile forces and devotes himself to the improvement of the livelihood of the Korean people.
					
					 It noted that the People's Unity Party of Tunisia opposes and rejects the U.S. imperialists' provocative move to hinder the Korean people's progressive development and their struggle for socialist construction.
